timeline.bodyText: When was this signature available ? In 11 or in an earlier version ?
timeline.author: baldersheim

replies.bodyText: 7 or earlier. The other signature was deprecated in llvm 8 and removed in llvm 11.
replies.author: toregge

replies.bodyText: Then I suggest you change to test for the version where the new signature was available. What is the oldest llvm version we require ?
replies.author: baldersheim

replies.bodyText: But then we can just avoid the ifdef and use the new signature directly.
replies.author: baldersheim

timeline.message: Always use new signature for CreateCall.
